What @atndigcrk said.

Well, I'm not going to be politically correct this time.
If a so-called-scene release group wants its tag on a torrent, well they can came here and upload it; if they will be the first, they will have respect and thanks, even from me. 
But I will not give this kind of respect to people who share their (good) work only among themselves; that's why i don't like the "scene", that's why i don't like private trackers too.
I know that many of you guys don't agree with me, but i'm an old-school-bastard, i know what i'm doing, and i'm not going to change idea about it, doesn't matter what other people think.
